project_short_description: An example package. Generated with cookiecutter-pylibrary.
c_extension_test_pypi_appveyor_secret: Get encrypted password from https://ci.appveyor.com/account/{{ cookiecutter.repo_username }}/tools/encrypt
c_extension_test_pypi_travis_secret:
# The password should be set in https://travis-ci.org/{{ cookiecutter.repo_username }}/{{ cookiecutter.repo_name }}/settings
    # Alternatively you can run this shell oneliner if you got travis gem installed:
    #
    #   echo -n "Password:"; (read -s p; echo -n TWINE_PASSWORD=$p) | travis encrypt --add=env.global --repo={{ cookiecutter.repo_username }}/{{ cookiecutter.repo_name }}
coveralls_token: Required for Appveyor, take it from https://coveralls.io/github/{{ cookiecutter.repo_username }}/{{ cookiecutter.repo_name }}
codacy_projectid: Get ID from https://app.codacy.com/app/{{ cookiecutter.repo_username }}/{{ cookiecutter.repo_name }}/settings
